name: Bubble Shooter Blast
description:
SHOOT & POP bubbles in the best bubble shooter game! Join the galactic adventure, blast all the colorful balloons, and test your strategy and logic skills solving fun puzzles.
Hundreds of challenging bubble-popping levels are waiting in this awesome bubble pop game, are you up for the challenge?
Play today and start the action! Pop the bubbles, clear the board and win coins. Journey across space, soar among the stars and fight to save the bubble galaxy.
Rush to download this new game now, and experience easy and fun gameplay. Tap on the screen to shoot and explode balls, make blasting bubble combinations and plan your moves to win. Popping bubbles is the best way to relax and pass the time!

Play everywhere, anywhere and as much as you want, no internet connection needed. You can play any level over and not have to wait for lives, as they are unlimited!
Feeling competitive? Share this fun free game with friends and see who can beat all the challenges and reach the highest score.


Bubble Shooter Blast Ball Pop Features:
+ Hundreds of epic and addicting levels to solve.
+ Cool graphics and visual effects.
+ Fun puzzles packed with brain teasers and challenges.
+ Classic game mode. Smash the bubble drops and win bonuses!
+ Easy bubble game to pick up and play.
+ Bubbling game with awesome puzzles.
+ Free puzzle game. Don’t worry about wifi, this is a fun offline game that you can play anytime you’d like!


Do you love free blast games? Can’t get enough of exciting bubble quests? Then this fun bubble shooter is your perfect choice!

This addictive balloons blaster offers some free puzzles, more than hundreds of challenging battle levels and hours of fun. Join the intergalactic war, tap on the screen to shoot balls, make powerful explosions and win cool boosts and power-ups.

Enjoy the amazing pop bubbles game designed to keep your brain sharp and active. Orbit the earth, travel in a spaceship to different planets and have a blast shooting all the bubbles. Bubble Shooter Blast Ball Pop is the most addicting game ever!



Play & Win:
+ Drag your finger to move the laser aim and lift it to smash bubbles.
+ Match 3 or more bubbles of the same color to pop the group and win points.
+ Try to get 3 stars on every level by reaching high scores and using fewer shots.
+ Pop your way through space and all the bubbling levels.
+ Hit the balls and reach the level target.
+ Earn great rewards and power-ups by making special shots.
+ Aim carefully and burst all the balls!
🔥 Pop 7 balls in a row and the fireball will burn up bubbles on the way.
💣 Drop 10 balloons or more, and the bomb will take out surrounding bubbles.

With so many exciting levels, cool boosters and power-ups, Bubble Shooter Blast Ball Pop is a must have game for your Android device!

Liked the game? We would love to get your feedback! Let us know what we can add to make our gameplay even more enjoyable and earn your 5-star review.

All rights of Bubble Shooter ™ are owned by Ilyon Dynamics Ltd.
